content: You are Marco. Regarding your successfully completed an action 'wage_payment' involving Bernardo., Bernardo just said to you: '"Ah, Marco! Much appreciated, truly. That's a good weight of coins distributed."' What is your brief, natural reply?
"You're very welcome, Bernardo. Glad to hear it was a satisfactory distribution."

You are Marco. Regarding your successfully completed an action 'wage_payment' involving Bernardo., Bernardo just said to you: '"Ah, Marco! Excellent work on that wage payment – much appreciated!"' What is your brief, natural reply?
"You're very welcome, Bernardo! Glad to be of service."
